title: [DO NOT MERGE] Remove ReduceOpsKernel
body_html:
This is in response to an issue.

EDIT: A real fix is coming up. This issue is centered around Tensor's where size(dim) == 1 but stride(dim) is arbitrary. This still makes a valid contiguous tensor. However, the reduction code was not taking this into account.
body_text:
This is in response to an issue.
EDIT: A real fix is coming up. This issue is centered around Tensor's where size(dim) == 1 but stride(dim) is arbitrary. This still makes a valid contiguous tensor. However, the reduction code was not taking this into account.
body:
This is in response to [an issue](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/6792).

EDIT: A real fix is coming up. This issue is centered around Tensor's where size(dim) == 1 but stride(dim) is arbitrary. This still makes a [valid contiguous tensor](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/d26ab68485fe32da1b696d0ce3a273a8c43ae207/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensor.cpp#L626). However, the reduction code was not taking this into account.
